org.mdconverter.consolehandler

Class ConsoleHandlerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • java.io.PrintStream
          • org.mdconverter.consolehandler.ConsoleHandlerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable, ConsoleHandler

    @Singleton
public class ConsoleHandlerImpl
extends PrintStream
implements ConsoleHandler
    Created by miso on 23.10.2015.
    is used by the Framework and all plugins
